About

Hello. My name is Mehrdad Abbasi (pronounced as [MEH-RDaa-D)””] in English and written as: “مهرداد عباسی” in Persian). . I’m a Security Researcher living in Iran with a passion for art and technology, who have worked with a number of different companies since the 2008, including Mojsazan, Pardazeshgaran, and my own company Opsnit. More information can be found through LinkedIn.
